examples.example: 我觉得生活中处处都充满着惊喜和美好。

translate.english: I think that life is full of surprises and beauty everywhere.

examples.example: 我觉得每天都保持积极的心态，生活会更加精彩。

translate.english: I think that keeping a positive attitude every day, life will be more wonderful.

examples.example: 我觉得只要努力奋斗，未来一定会更加美好。

translate.english: I think as long as we strive hard, the future will definitely be more beautiful.
